about_the_game:
The RPG Tycoon Festive Fun Pack is the first themed content pack for RPG Tycoon and adds a number of new holiday themed items for your adventurers and heroes to enjoy in your kingdom.

Features:
  • Santas Grotto
  • Snowy Quarters
  • 4 Christmas Themed Decorations
  • New Elf Hero Class
  • Special Santa Claus Hero Class

Enable the pack to install the Festive Fun Pack and restart RPG Tycoon to enjoy.
detailed_description:
The RPG Tycoon Festive Fun Pack is the first themed content pack for RPG Tycoon and adds a number of new holiday themed items for your adventurers and heroes to enjoy in your kingdom.

Features:
  • Santas Grotto
  • Snowy Quarters
  • 4 Christmas Themed Decorations
  • New Elf Hero Class
  • Special Santa Claus Hero Class

Enable the pack to install the Festive Fun Pack and restart RPG Tycoon to enjoy.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX v10.6
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space

name: RPG Tycoon: Festive Fun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista® Home Premium, Business, Ultimate, or Enterprise (including 64 bit editions) with Service Pack 2, Windows 7, Windows 8 Classic or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space

short_description: Celebrate the holidays with this free Christmas themed content pack for RPG Tycoon adding new decorations, skins and quests to your kingdoms!
